name: ECHO SOCIETY FOR COMMUNITY OPERATION AND REDEMPTION FROM TROUBLES (ESCORT)
briefDescription: The ESCORT are registered under societyâ€™s registration Act 35 of 2001 for charitable activities.We are made plan to improve the services rural areas and urban areas in ESCORT society banner.The society main objectives are social awareness, rehabilitation and health,The main office is located in Nidubrolu, Ponnur Mandal, Guntur district Andhra Pradesh.The target people of this society or Rural areas in first priority and areas in second preference the service is of the society or rendered to the poor, irrespective of caste, creed and religion
